chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
b: naryFunc n
a: naryFunc n

Goal:
Prop

Premises:
naryFunc = fix naryFunc (n : nat) : Set := match n with | 0 => nat | S n0 => nat -> naryFunc n0 end : nat -> Set Arguments naryFunc _%nat_scope
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, Fin.FS x = Fin.FS y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat a : naryFunc n b : naryFunc n |- nat]
ltof : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> A -> A -> Prop
gt = fun n m : nat => m < n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gt (_ _)%nat_scope
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.Even = fun n : nat => exists m : nat, n = 2 * m : nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Even _%nat_scope
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
IsSucc = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => False | S _ => True end : nat -> Prop Arguments IsSucc _%nat_scope
Nat.eqf = fun f g : nat -> bool => forall n : nat, f n = g n : (nat -> bool) -> (nat -> bool) -> Prop Arguments Nat.eqf (_ _)%function_scope
Ndigits.eqf = fun f g : nat -> bool => forall n : nat, f n = g n : (nat -> bool) -> (nat -> bool) -> Prop Arguments Ndigits.eqf (_ _)%function_scope
Inductive le (n : nat) : nat -> Prop := le_n : n <= n | le_S : forall m : nat, n <= m -> n <= S m Arguments le (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments le_n _%nat_scope Arguments le_S (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive between (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := bet_emp : between P k k | bet_S : forall l : nat, between P k l -> P l -> between P k (S l) Arguments between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bet_emp _%function_scope _%nat_scope Arguments bet_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
Record sign_theory (C : Type) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (get_sign : C -> option C) : Prop := mksign_th { sign_spec : forall c c' : C, get_sign c = Some c' -> ceqb c (copp c') = true } Arguments sign_theory [C]%type_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope Arguments mksign_th [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope
Field_theory.PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Record ring_eq_ext (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_reqe { Radd_ext : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) radd; Rmul_ext : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req (Morphisms.respectful req req)) rmul; Ropp_ext : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful req req) ropp } Arguments ring_eq_ext [R]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments mk_reqe [R]%type_scope [radd rmul ropp req]%function_scope
Ring_polynom.interp_PElist : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Record power_theory (R : Type) (rI : R) (rmul : R -> R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) : Prop := mkpow_th { rpow_pow_N : forall (r : R) (n : BinNums.N), req (rpow r (Cp_phi n)) (pow_N rI rmul r n) } Arguments power_theory [R]%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope [Cpow]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope Arguments mkpow_th [R]%type_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope [Cpow]%type_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
Record div_theory (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cadd cmul : C -> C -> C) (phi : C -> R) (cdiv : C -> C -> C * C) : Prop := mkdiv_th { div_eucl_th : forall a b : C, let (q, r) := cdiv a b in req (phi a) (phi (cadd (cmul b q) r)) } Arguments div_theory [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments mkdiv_th [R]%type_scope _%function_scope [C]%type_scope (_ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), P x -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (m : nat) (x : A) (v : VectorDef.t A m), VectorDef.Exists P v -> VectorDef.Exists P (VectorDef.cons A x m v) Arguments VectorDef.Exists {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {n}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_hd {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.Exists_cons_tl {A}%type_scope _%function_scope {m}%nat_scope
Record almost_field_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_afield { AF_AR : almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req; AF_1_neq_0 : ~ req rI rO; AFdiv_def : forall p q : R, req (rdiv p q) (rmul p (rinv q)); AFinv_l : forall p : R, ~ req p rO -> req (rmul (rinv p) p) rI } Arguments Field_theory.almost_field_theory [R]%type_scope _ _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope Arguments Field_theory.mk_afield [R]%type_scope [rO rI] [radd rmul rsub ropp]%function_scope (_ _)%...
Record ring_morph (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R) : Prop := mkmorph { morph0 : req (phi cO) rO; morph1 : req (phi cI) rI; morph_add : forall x y : C, req (phi (cadd x y)) (radd (phi x) (phi y)); morph_sub : forall x y : C, req (phi (csub x y)) (rsub (phi x) (phi y)); morph_mul : forall x y : C, req (phi (cmul x y)) (rmul (phi x) (phi y)); morph_opp : forall x :...
Record almost_ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_art { ARadd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; ARadd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); ARadd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); ARmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; ARmul_0_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rO x) rO; ARmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); ARmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul...
Inductive FExpr (C : Type) : Type := FEO : Field_theory.FExpr C | FEI : Field_theory.FExpr C | FEc : C -> Field_theory.FExpr C | FEX : BinNums.positive -> Field_theory.FExpr C | FEadd : Field_theory.FExpr C ->...-> Field_theory.FExpr C Arguments Field_theory.FExpr _%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEO {C}%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEI {C}%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEc [C]%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEX _%type_scope _%positive_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEadd [C]%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEsub [C]%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEmul [C]%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEopp [C]%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEinv [C]%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEdiv [C]%type_scope Arguments Field_theory.FEpow [C]%type_scope _ _%N_scope
Nnat.Nat2N.id : forall n : nat, BinNat.N.to_nat (BinNat.N.of_nat n) = n
Nat.clearbit = fun a n : nat => Nat.ldiff a (Nat.shiftl 1 n) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.clearbit (_ _)%nat_scope
well_founded_ltof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (ltof A f)
ARopp_zero : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> req (ropp rO) rO
Nat.lt_total : forall n m : nat, n < m \/ n = m \/ m < n
Nat.lt_wd = PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wd_obligation_1 : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) lt
Nat.min_case : forall (n m : nat) (P : nat -> Type), P n -> P m -> P (Nat.min n m)
Ndigits.eqf_equiv = {| RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive := RelationClasses.Equivalence_Reflexive; RelationClasses.Equivalence_Symmetric := RelationClasses.Equivalence_Symmetric; RelationClasses.Equivalence_Transitive := RelationClasses.Equivalence_Transitive |} : RelationClasses.Equivalence Ndigits.eqf
